channel.title: Why is the Dragon Skirt Not working Correctly when i move?
channel.description:
i got a model, did the whole process and all but when i equipt it and run it looks messed up? how could i fix this?
VIDEO: [URL=http://s600.photobucket.com/albums/tt81/omgmike1/?action=view&current=Untitled-4.flv][IMG]http://i600.photobucket.com/albums/tt81/omgmike1/th_Untitled-4.jpg[/img][/URL]
ALSO: Jjones i wont release any more models/ints for people if u dont want me too, just goona do this for my own benefit then -_-'

item.title: Why is the Dragon Skirt Not working Correctly when i move?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Michaelmmm:

could i PLEASE get the link, i need a tut to show how to animate d legs/skirt or boots ect… not using other models such as a metallic t shirt ect… cause it’s confusing for me

It’s right at the bottom of my big stickied tutorial, you may find it confusing though.

Read full topic
